title: Fork, ca. 1600
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Fork has two long pointed tines, rounded shoulders. Baluster-shaped neck, octagonal in section, gilded and laminated wood, steel, brass socket. Bone pistol-shaped handle, inlaid with brass wire and small wooden bands in diaper pattern. Lozenges filled with wooden dots and brass wire. End of handle inlaid with rozette.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1600.
ca. 1600. steel, bone, brass, wood. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-39.
